import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={tasks:{"09293":{taskId:"09293",taskData:{title:"this first task",description:"this first task full description",completed:true}}}};export var taskSlice=createSlice({name:"task",initialState:initialState,reducers:{addTask:function addTask(state,action){state.tasks[action.payload.taskId]=action.payload;},editTask:function editTask(state,action){state.tasks[action.payload.taskId]=action.payload.task;},deleteTask:function deleteTask(state,action){delete state.tasks[action.payload];}}});// Action creators are generated for each case reducer function
var _taskSlice$actions=taskSlice.actions,addTask=_taskSlice$actions.addTask,editTask=_taskSlice$actions.editTask,deleteTask=_taskSlice$actions.deleteTask;export{addTask,editTask,deleteTask};export default taskSlice.reducer;
